triples.name: Public goods game
triples.relevance: The paper studies the evolutionary dynamics of this game in social systems with higher-order interactions.

triples.name: Social network
triples.relevance: The foundational framework for understanding cooperation and interactions in networked groups.

triples.name: Evolutionary dynamics
triples.relevance: The paper proposes and studies evolutionary dynamics applied to higher-order interactions in social systems.

triples.name: Hypergraph
triples.relevance: The paper proposes using hypergraphs as the framework for modeling higher-order interactions and groups.

triples.name: Replicator equation
triples.relevance: The paper uses replicator dynamics as the theoretical foundation to study cooperation in networked groups.

triples.name: Cooperation (evolution)
triples.relevance: The paper proposes methods to boost cooperation in social groups through informed actions based on their framework.
